# Water Tank 

Water tanks are plastic reservoirs.

<https://github.com/vitay/water-tank>

## Installation

Dependencies:

* `python`>= 3.9
* `numpy` >= 1.21
* `scipy`>= 1.11

In a virtual environment:

```console
pip install git+https://github.com/vitay/water-tank.git@master
```
